content:
Hi All,

CSIRO and DXC Technology are pleased to invite you to a FHIR Community Night on the 10th of December. This is a great opportunity to hear more about what is happening in the world of FHIR and informally network with the community. It's also a great way to continue the conversations started at connectathons! There will be food and drinks provided.

The event will be hosted at DXC Technology â€“ Level 19, 360 Collins Street, Melbourne.

Please register using the link below by 9 Dec 2019
https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/melbourne-fhir-community-meetup-tickets-82552056423
